video.title: Small Town Security
video.synopsis: This series turns its cameras on JJK, a security firm in rural Georgia with big dreams and an employee roster out of central casting.

episodes.synopsis: The JJK gang deals with the fallout of being on television. Irwin recruits Christa to bring in new accounts, and the Chief tries to redeem herself.
episodes.title: The Wicked Witch of Georgia

episodes.synopsis: Lt. Croft aims to turn the guards of JJK into an elite force by putting them through a rigorous set of training exercises.
episodes.title: Elite Force!

episodes.synopsis: Captain schemes to sell Chief’s Mustang behind her back. Brian takes Christa on a stakeout, and Lieutenant helps Chief manage her anger.
episodes.title: JJK For Sale

episodes.synopsis: Lt. Croft petitions for a legal name change against Chief’s wishes. Captain loses a good friend. Christa tries to cut back on smoking.
episodes.title: A Starr Is Born

episodes.synopsis: Captain Starr taunts the Chief with a new, ultra-realistic prosthetic, while Irwin reconnects with his estranged brother.
episodes.title: Old Family, New Member

episodes.synopsis: Brian organizes a boys’ camping trip: Captain’s first male-only outing. Meanwhile, Christa tries to entertain Chief.
episodes.title: Inipi

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Starr and his security force work a rave. Irwin overhauls Joan’s local show, while the Chief adds a new dimension to the office love triangle.
episodes.title: All Hands on Deck

episodes.synopsis: Chief struggles with her emotions as Capt. Starr gets surgery. Christa takes office cleanup to the next level when she hires a goat to mow the lawn.
episodes.title: The Man Makes the Suit

episodes.synopsis: Dennis creates a new training tape for JJK. Joan decides to capitalize on the Speecy Spicy Meatball. Irwin shows off his storage room.
episodes.title: Someone's Got the Meatball

episodes.synopsis: Dennis turns to online dating to fill the gap in his relationship with Joan while Irwin looks for ways to relieve stress.
episodes.title: The Dragon Takes Flight

episodes.synopsis: JJK gets a muddy gig while Irwin devotes his time to a group of rough young ladies. Joan deals with the loss of her greatest love.
episodes.title: Lambchop's Last Bite

episodes.synopsis: JJK loses a big client, and Irwin works to ensure guard loyalty. Joan struggles with her health and her local cable access show.
episodes.title: Heady Times Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Joan gets a shocking diagnosis that comes with some tough side effects. Brian and Dennis land a geeky gig while Christa does some dirty work.
episodes.title: Heady Times Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Dennis hosts iconic McGruff the Crime Dog. Joan begins radiation with no desire to relax. When JJK cuts Christa's hours, she takes on some odd jobs.
episodes.title: Watch Dogs

episodes.synopsis: Dennis leads guards on a training mission overnight in a cave. Brian coaches Joan through rapid detox from bad diet habits as her recovery continues.
episodes.title: The Belly of the Beast

episodes.synopsis: Irwin de-stresses while Joan convalesces in L.A. Dennis reveals his biggest shocker yet about Joan. The gang celebrates JJK's 30th anniversary.
episodes.title: Hail to the Chief
